mapper.select: SELECT RD.RECIPE_ID ,RD.RECIPE_NAME ,RD.INGREDIENTS_KEY ,IM.INGREDIENTS_ID ,IM.INGREDIENTS_NAME ,RD.SEASONING_KEY ,SM.SEASONING_ID ,SM.SEASONING_NAME ,RD.PROCESS_KEY ,PD.PROCESS ,PD.COOKING_TIME ,RD.MOOD_KEY ,MM.MOOD_ID ,MM.MOOD_NAME ,RD.RECIPE_TYPE_ID ,TM.TYPE_NAME FROM RECIPE_DATA RD INNER JOIN INGREDIENTS_DATA ID ON RD.INGREDIENTS_KEY = ID.INGREDIENTS_KEY INNER JOIN INGREDIENTS_MASTER IM ON ID.INGREDIENTS_ID = IM.INGREDIENTS_ID INNER JOIN TYPE_MASTER TM ON ID.TYPE_ID = TM.TYPE_ID INNER JOIN SEASONING_DATA SD ON RD.SEASONING_KEY = SD.SEASONING_KEY INNER JOIN SEASONING_MASTER SM ON SD.SEASONING_ID = SM.SEASONING_ID INNER JOIN PROCESS_DATA PD ON RD.PROCESS_KEY = PD.PROCESS_KEY INNER JOIN MOOD_DATA MD ON RD.MOOD_KEY = MD.MOOD_KEY INNER JOIN MOOD_MASTER MM ON MD.MOOD_ID = MM.MOOD_ID WHERE RD.RECIPE_NAME = #recipe_name AND IM.DEL_FLG = '0' AND SM.DEL_FLG = '0' AND MM.DEL_FLG = '0';
